overview:
Entrepreneurial leader and decision maker with strong track record shaping and guiding organizational success in the e-commerce and new media industries.

Since 1997, been building e-commerce & m-commerce strategies for brands, media and entertainment clients. Specialized in setting up strategic deals related to distribution, user acquisition and marketing with media networks, ad agencies and content companies. Strong track record of setting up innovative business models, marketing strategies and new product development efforts. Been involved in various projects with global responsibilities and recognized as a pioneer of the mobile entertainment space between Europe and North America .

Since 2005, been based in NYC and have been building digital businesses in the internet 3.0, mobile technology and e-commerce spaces. Been capitalizing on my expertise with startup companies between Europe, NYC and Silicon Valley to launch great companies with amazing individuals.

Advisory board member at Exclusively.in. Advisory board member at Kinemo Inc.
